metadata.title: RA Family: Is there any document as reference for Ethernet Design?

sections.content: Is there any document as reference for Ethernet Design?
Yes, please check the application note provided in the link below:
RA Ethernet Design and Custom PHY Setup using FSP
This application note provides guidelines when using the RA MCU with RMII modes for Ethernet specific applications.
It addresses utilizing the FSP configurator to incorporate the Ethernet module and ensure proper configuration.
And provides instructions of how to integrate a new PHY into a custom board and providing software support for it through FSP.

links.text: RA Ethernet Design and Custom PHY Setup using FSP
